info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 10 at 7:00PM MDT until April 10 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 252... * Affected Area...In Colorado...Fire Weather Zone 252 Yuma. * Timing...Now through 9 PM MDT this evening. * Winds...Northwest 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 14 percent. * Temperatures...In the lower to middle 50s. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised. Blowing dust is expected with significantly reduced visibilities possible. This may delay response time if any fires break out. * Additional Details... RFW for Sunday April 10th extended for 2 hours as drier air moves through this evening and winds gust 25-30 mph.
info.instruction: Avoid creating sparks. Take notice of any local burn bans.
